name: Từ vựng Tiếng Anh các từ vựng khác liên quan đến gia đình (Other related words)

words.example: I love spending time with my family.
All my relatives gathered for the holiday dinner.
My ancestors came from Europe many centuries ago.
She is a direct descendant of the famous artist.
This new generation is very comfortable with technology.
I can't wait to go home after a long day at work.
They bought a beautiful house with a big garden.
Their marriage has lasted for over fifty years.
The wedding ceremony was held by the beach.
We celebrated our tenth wedding anniversary last month.
Trust is essential in any healthy relationship.
Even though they are not blood relations, they treat each other like siblings.
